mosinstall.name: Latest products
mosinstall.author: Soeren Eberhardt
mosinstall.description: Shows the Latest Products from your Shop.

param.name: max_items
param.label: Number of displayed products
param.description: This defines the number of products which will be displayed in the module.

param.name: show_price
param.label: Show Product Price?
param.description: Defines wether the product price is displayed or not.

param.name: show_addtocart
param.label: Show Add-To-Cart Link?
param.description: Defines wether the Add-To-Cart Link is displayed or not.

param.name: display_style
param.label: Diplay Style
param.description: Here you can decide wether the products are shown in a horizontal or vertical list

param.name: products_per_row
param.label: Products per row
param.description: Only when Table is selected: The Number of columns per row in the table for the product snapshots.

param.name: category_id
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Here you can set a category_id so that only products from this special Category are displayed. Just leave blank if you want to display from all categories.
